markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 5"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Murderous Thorns](/Feats.aspx?ID=3950) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Ghoran" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=352" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Impossible Lands](/Sources.aspx?ID=146) pg. 38</row>

**Prerequisites**
[Hidden Thorn](/Feats.aspx?ID=3948) or [Thorned Rose](/Heritages.aspx?ID=210) heritage

</column>

---

Your thorns are many, vicious, and sharp. If you have the Hidden Thorn feat, your thorn attack gains the [deadly d6](/Traits.aspx?ID=174) trait. If you have the thorned rose heritage, you can use the Wicked Thorns reaction once every hour.
name: Murderous Thorns
prerequisite: Hidden Thorn or Thorned Rose heritage

text: <title level="1" right="Feat 5" pfs="Standard" > Murderous Thorns Source Impossible Lands pg. 38 Prerequisites Hidden Thorn or Thorned Rose heritage --- Your thorns are many, vicious, and sharp. If you have the Hidden Thorn feat, your thorn attack gains the deadly d6 trait. If you have the thorned rose heritage, you can use the Wicked Thorns reaction once every hour.
